com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.sqltool

Class SQLLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.AbstractLoader
      • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.sqltool.SQLLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loader

    public final class SQLLoader
extends AbstractLoader
    Loader that uses HSQLDB's SqlFile to load a DDL/DML script into the database.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews
